import React, { Fragment, useState, useRef } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import { Button, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, FormGroup, Label, Input, Form, Progress, Container } from 'reactstrap'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import _ from "lodash"; const CreateNewCourseOverviewReview = ({ overallProgress, setOverallProgress, setProgress, courseData, userData }) => { console.log("CreateNewCourseOverviewReview courseData - : ", courseData); const handlePostingAndFinalDataSubmission = () => { console.log("handlePostingAndFinalDataSubmission ran...!"); } const mainPic = `${process.env.REACT_APP_ASSET_LINK}/${courseData.pageThreeData.homepageImage.link}` return (

{overallProgress}% Complete

Course information review & submission - PAGE ONE (1) DATA

You will now need to review all of your information to make sure all data is correct before proceeding to post your course for sale. If you need to change any data, simply click the "edit" icon and you will be redirected back to the appropriate page while saving all of your data so you can edit just that single data point...

Course information review & submission - PAGE TWO (2) DATA

{"You will find your 'Main' banner/core picture above..."}

{"This picture will be shown initially when people first see your listing/course for sale - This will display on 'mapped' listview's and other similar areas thoughout our site!"}

 ); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userData: state.auth.data, courseData: _.has(state.courseData, "courseData") ? state.courseData.courseData : null } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { })(CreateNewCourseOverviewReview);
